author: Conor Gallagher
title: Coronavirus: Gardaí walk tightrope between coercion and persuasion
description: Draconian power to keep people at home will be bolstered by public disapproval of flouters
content:
Until now the State has been employing what behavioural scientists call soft paternalism in its approach to coronavirus urging rather than ordering people to stay at home for the good of their fellow citizens.
Even since the announcement of new restrictions … [+5209 chars]
